actions.name: Shackle
actions.description: Effect: The user's [Contact] attacks inflict @Affliction[slowed] 5. If a creature already has the @Affliction[slowed] Affliction they are instead inflicted with @Affliction[stuck] X and @Affliction[bound] X where X is equal to half their current @Affliction[slowed] Stacks rounded down.
